meanings.definition: A type of paint that dries to a hard, glossy finish.
meanings.sent1: She used enamels to add color to her artwork.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully applied the enamels to the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The enamels spilled on the floor, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as freshly applied enamels.
meanings.sent5: The enamels shimmered under the bright lights of the gallery.

meanings.definition: A decorative coating applied to metal or ceramics.
meanings.sent1: The jewelry was adorned with intricate enamels.
meanings.sent2: The vase had beautiful floral enamels on its surface.
meanings.sent3: The enamels on the teapot made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the delicate touch of fine enamels.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the smooth surface of the enamels.

meanings.definition: To coat or decorate with enamel.
meanings.sent1: She carefully enamels the metal jewelry to give it a glossy finish.
meanings.sent2: He enamels the car parts to protect them from rust.
meanings.sent3: The chef enamels the cake with colorful frosting.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like delicate strokes as she enamels the story.
meanings.sent5: The artist enamels the sculpture with precision and care.
